title: Cavendish, Ewan, Philipsen, Someone Else? Here’s Who We Think Will Be Sprint King in 2024
content:
Who will dominate the argy-bargy world of bunch sprints in 2024? Velo editors Andrew Hood, Jim Cotton, Shane Stokes argue it out.

Read the full article at Cavendish, Ewan, Philipsen, Someone Else? Here’s Who We Think Will Be Sprint King in 2024 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
